elements.name: Verify user should be able to verify product arrange in alphabetical order on page

steps.name: I am on homepage
I click on "Computer" menu on homepage
I click on "Desktop" tab on computer page
I select sort by position "Name: Z to A"
I should be able to verify the product will arrange in descending order

elements.name: Verify User Should be able to add product successfully in shopping cart

steps.name: I am on homepage
I click on "Computer" menu on homepage
I click on "Desktop" tab on computer page
I select Sort By Position "Name: A to Z" ascending order
I click on Add to Cart Button
I should be able to verify the text "Build your own computer"
I enter below details in build your computer page
I select various radio buttons options
I should be able to Verify Price
I click on Add TO Cart Button On Desktop Page
I should be able to verify text "The product has been added to your shopping cart on Top green Bar"

arguments.val: The product has been added to your shopping cart on Top green Bar

steps.name: I close the bar clicking on the cross button
I MouseHover on "Shopping cart" and Click on "GO TO CART" button.
I should be able to verify Shopping Cart Text
I change the Qty to "2" and Click on Update shopping Button
I verify the Total Price after clicking on Update Button
I click on checkbox “I agree with the terms of service” on page
I click on CheckOut button
I should be Verify the text "Welcome, Please Sign In!"
I click on Checkout As a Guest Tab
I select "country" From Country DropDown
I enter below details in check out page
I click on the "Continue" Button
I click On Radio Button "Next Day Air($0.00)"
I click On the "shippingMethodContinueButton" Button Tab
I click on the  "selectCreditCardRadioButton" tab button
I click on "continuePaymentButton" button
I select "Master Card" from credit card dropdown
I fill below details in credit card form in payment page
I click on payment continue button
I should be able to verify "payment method" is Credit Card
I should be able to verify "shipping method" is Next Day Air
I should be able to verify  "price" on Page
I click On "Confirm" button on checkOut Page
I should be able to verify "Thank You" text on checkOut Page
I should be able to  verify "Your order has been successfully processed!" on checkout nopcommerce page

arguments.val: Your order has been successfully processed!

steps.name: I click on "continue" in checkout page
I should be able to verify text "Welcome to our store" on welcome checkout page

name: Computers Test
description: As a user I want to add product in shopping cart successfully

elements.name: User successfully navigate to cell phones page successfully

steps.name: I am on the homepage

steps.name: I mouse hover on the "Electronics" tab
I mouse hover on "Cell phones" and click
I should see the text "Cell phones" on the page

elements.name: User should verify that the product added successfully and place order successfully

steps.name: I am on the homepage
I mouse hover on the "Electronics" tab
I mouse hover on "Cell phones" and click
I should see the text "Cell phones" on the page
I click on the "List View" tab
I click on the product name "Nokia Lumia 1020" link
I can see the text "Nokia Lumia 1020" on the page
I should see the price "$349.00"
I change the quantity to 2
I click on the "ADD TO CART" button
I should see the message "The product has been added to your shopping cart" on the top green bar

arguments.val: The product has been added to your shopping cart

steps.name: I close the bar by clicking on the cross button
I mouse hover on "Shopping cart" and click on "GO TO CART" button
I should be able to verify message "shopping cart"
I should be able to verify quantity 2
I can see the total $698.00
I click on the checkbox “I agree with the terms of service” on page
I click on checkout
I should be able to see text "Welcome, Please Sign In!"
I click on register tab
I should be able to see text Register on register page
I enter email "random email"
I fill below details in the registration form
I click on register button
I should be able to see message "Your registration completed"
I click on continue button
I can see text "Shopping cart"
I click on login link
I enter email "random email" into email field
I enter password "Password1" into password field
I click on log in button
I click on the checkbox I agree with the terms of service
I click on the checkout tab
I enter email "random email" into the email field
I select country from drop down
I fill below details in form in checkout after registration
I click on continue tab
I click on radio button "2nd Day Air ($0.00)"
I click on continue from shipping method
I select radio button credit card
I click on continue tab from payment method
I select visa from select credit card dropdown
I fill below details in credit card form
I click on the payment continue button
I should be able to verify payment method is "Credit Card"
I can see shipping method is "2nd Day Air"
I can able to verify total "$698.00"
I click on confirm button
I should be able to verify the text Thank You
I can see the message "Your order has been successfully processed!"

arguments.val: Your order has been successfully processed!

steps.name: I click on the continue tab
I can able to see the text "Welcome to our store"
I click on log out link
I am able to verify the URL "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/"
I should be able to add product successfully and placed order successfully

name: Electronics Test
description: As a user navigation to Cell Phones page

steps.name: I am on the homepage
I am able to navigate to  top menu tab page
I navigate to top menu tab page

name: Top Menu Test
description: As a user I should navigate to homepage
